patient_info: Irritability,Personality changes,Tremor,Nausea,Abdominal pain,Hepatomegaly,Sleep disturbance,Poor appetite,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Elevated circulating aspartate aminotransferase concentration,Elevated circulating alanine aminotransferase concentration,Mania,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Wilson's disease (肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病)
2. Hepatolenticular degeneration (肝豆状核变性)
3. Copper toxicosis (铜中毒)
4. Primary biliary cholangitis (原发性胆汁性肝硬化)
5. Secondary biliary cirrhosis (继发性胆汁性肝硬化)
6. Cholangiocarcinoma (胆管癌)
7. Liver abscess (肝脓肿)
8. Cirrhosis (肝硬化)
9. Portal hypertension (门静脉高压)
10. Budd-Chiari syndrome (布加综合症)

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the provided clinical phenotype and are not mutually exclusive. Further evaluation, laboratory tests, and imaging studies will be necessary to narrow down the diagnosis. It is important to consider other rare and common liver disorders, as well as genetic and metabolic liver diseases, when assessing the patient's condition. Always consult with a healthcare professional for accurate diagnosis and treatment.
